description: Three may be a charm, but four is incontestably fantastic! Aaron Parker, Colton Ford, Jerek, and Travis Reed turn a flip of the coin into a steamy session of summer cocksucking, rimming, and group fucking. When these hot muscled studs have taken their turn and demonstrated their sexual skill, there's nothing left to do but soak in satisfaction and wait for a rematch!
title: Headgames, Scene #04
